NbdCalc01 
===========================================

OfficeGPU AK40: The NBD GPU Linux Server consists of 28-core processors and 1 GPU AK40 of 11GB. It is
configured with a fast 512GB SSD Samsung NVMe PCIe and 2 x HD 4TB, SATA 6 Gb/s. Theoretical computer
performance peak can achieve 11.2TFlops. All NBD nodes run Linux CentOS and support Schrodinger
calculation at 1GbE.
This infrastructure is dedicated to Glide, SiteMap, Jaguar and all types of schrodinger calculations.
